headline: Why RTX (RTX) Is Up 5.2% After Spain’s Record US$1.7 Billion Patriot System Order – And What’s Next
summary: Earlier this week, Raytheon, an RTX business, secured a US$1.70 billion foreign military sales contract to supply Spain with four Patriot air and missile defense systems, including radars, launchers, command-and-control stations and training equipment. This is Spain’s largest Patriot order to date, reinforcing RTX’s position as a key supplier of integrated air and missile defense capabilities to U.S. allies. Next, we’ll examine how Spain’s record Patriot order could influence RTX’s defense...
